name: Heavy Hooffall
description: A percussion instrument found in the Frostmoon Enclave. The triangular stand offers great stability and support for the considerable weight of the drum. Both the drumhead and stand are adorned with antler motifs representing local culture.\nWhen struck by Frostmoon Scions, the deep and resonant drumbeats evoke the distant thunder of the Rimehorn Deer charging across the land.
